Name: Mirror Match
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Boozy and floral with a hint of sweetness to smooth and harmonise, this after-dinner cocktail, originally served straight-up in a coupe (as presented here) but we prefer ours on-the-rocks.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2017 by Madeleine Rapp at The Dead Rabbit Grocery & Grog in New York, New York City, USA. Drink courtesy of gazregan.com .
Nutrition: One serving of Mirror Match contains 189 calories
